lines.text: Force acts in direction of motion
When natural frequency, driving frequency nearly equal

secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:pwsec_m372:Compare] simple harmonic motion to uniform circular motion.
2. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_m37145:period of a mass on a spring].
3. Define and calculate the [OBJ:expsec_m373:period of a simple pendulum].
4. Describe [OBJ:expsec_m375:forced oscillations and resonance].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37016:Calculate] the period of the pendulum on a clock.
